phrs.translation: 狡猾, 巧妙, 诡计多端

sentences.sentence: Their faces assumed the awful craftiness of children listening for sounds from the grown-up world.
sentences.translation: 他们的脸上流露出孩子们听成人世界的声音时那种非常狡黠的神情。

sentences.sentence: not walking in craftiness, nor handling the word of God deceitfully;
sentences.translation: 不行诡诈，不谬讲神的道理。

sentences.sentence: This person too craftiness, this can calculate is a deserved result!
sentences.translation: 这个人太狡猾了，这可算得是应得的后果！
